title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 370.8 - Shelter residents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 370.8 - Shelter residents

State Regulations

Social services districts must: (a) supply public shelter residents with
information regarding their eligibility to apply for safety net assistance; and
(b) strongly encourage public
shelter residents to apply for safety net assistance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
370.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
